entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: In-object fixed size arrays in safe context #55772
    Area-Language Design, untriaged
  • String interpolation or concatenation is wrong in .NET 6 #55763
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Navigate backwards is broken #55762
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Multi-process Cltr+F5 and attach #55761
    Interactive-EnC, Test-Scenario, untriaged, 17.0.P4
  • Switch with falltrough cases and assignment of a variable #55754
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • need some more documentation about source generators #55753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extract Base Class puts usings in the wrong spot when usings inside namespace #55746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.0

Closed

  • refactor to create local method creates argument for local const member #55031
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • "Rename" doesn't rename the type in a comment if I have check "Include Comments" #54294
    Bug, Area-IDE, Developer Community, 17.0
  • Inline Rename should include comments by default #55766
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • Nullable suppressions should remain disallowed on constant and type patterns #54071
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns, 17.0
  • Hot Reload fails with .NET MAUI (Android emulator scenario) #53111
    Bug, Interactive-EnC, 17.0
  • EnC - Relax restrictions on record parameter names matching #55732
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed, Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Nullable references checks and params arrays #55666
    Question, Area-Compilers, Area-External, Resolution-Answered, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • EnC analyzer needs to be updated for parameterless struct ctors #55547
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Internal modifier added to partial classes breaks new project creation for WinForms, WebTools and anything using partial classes in their templates #55703
    Bug, Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Urgency-Soon, Disabled Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK for Roslyn development #55680
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement

Updated

  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • IntraTextAdornments conflict with intellicode line completion proposals #55631
    Question, Area-IDE, 17.0
  • [EnC] Roslyn reports active statement from last break session on hot reload #54347
    Bug, Area-Interactive, 17.0.P4
  • Inheritance Margin tooltip polishing #54454
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Hang in Inline-Rename when there are errors in the method #55140
    Bug, Area-IDE, Area-Performance, 17.0
  • Remove HasChangesAsync #55625
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, 17.1
  • Improve diagnostic when `null` or `default(T?)` are used with unconstrained `T?` #54898
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Concept-Diagnostic Clarity, 17.1
  • Cannot read attribute arguments from metadata when the original definition parameter is of a type parameter type #55190
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Generic attributes don't properly resolve ambiguity with verbatim identifier #54772
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, 17.0
  • Proper nullable support for interpolated string handler constructors and conversions #54583
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.1
  • Double click inline adornment to insert text into document #55519
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, 17.1
  • EditorConfig UI: Select language for Analyzers #53834
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Switch case after `or` pattern does not match #55668
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Proposal: Avoid closures that capture a single reference-type variable per function #55758
    Area-Language Design, untriaged
  • Use a cached delegate for method group conversion #5835
    help wanted, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Tenet-Performance, 4 - In Review, Backlog
  • Script batch compilation/evaluation #21525
    Question, Area-Interactive, Interactive-ScriptingLogic, Backlog
  • Granular Source Generator APIs #51257
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Add option to disable graphical .editorconfig UI #54925
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Developer Community, Feature - Editor Config UI, 17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Change preview pane to hide unusable options #55775
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typing in rename preview changes #55774
    Area-IDE
  • Drop active statements when exiting break mode #55773
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, 17.0.P4
  • Chsienki/validation #55768
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously - and use in 'add nuget reference' code action #55759
    Area-IDE
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Update Build_Linux job to run on CoreEng build pool #55744
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55771
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #55738 from dotnet/main" #55769
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Bug fix extract local function errors C#7 and below #55446
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prefer symbol references in InlineRename #55747
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55742
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test for FixAll in ChangeNamespaceToMatchFolder #55479
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55770
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Skip flaky test #55706
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Avoid enumerator allocations for DiagnosticDescriptor.CustomTags #55760
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Disallow nullable suppression in patterns #54072
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Pass updated types to the debugger #55699
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • EnC - Allow changing names of previously synthesized record member parameters #55739
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55765
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55764
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Have inheritance-margin hold onto data that does *not* point back at Solution instances. #55696
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge `main` to `features/RawStringLiterals` #55752
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to simplify code to use the new extended property patterns when available. #55704
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55605
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update to latest async lightbulb api #55207
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55751
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55748
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Specify paths and shell on Windows #55694
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Don't add accessibility modifiers to partial classes in new documents #55713
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EnC - Parameterless struct constructors #55718
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, Next
  • Change the head of inheritance margin background to InActiveTextBox #55710
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55743
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55741
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main into main-vs-deps #55738
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55778
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55777
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55776
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on modifier or type of field #55523
    Area-IDE
  • Move Static Members: Refactor moved member references #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Add a preview option for ServiceHub Core host #55736
    Area-IDE
  • Region analysis of nameof #55724
    Area-Compilers
  • IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55717
    Area-Interactive
  • Use directory-scoped ALCs to load analyzers in .NET Core #55098
    Area-Compilers
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community, Need Design Review
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously (part 2) #55687
    Area-IDE
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extract local function: Variable shadowing prior CSharp 8 #55135
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extract class bug #55648
    Area-IDE
  • Warm up ImportCompletion cache in background when opening a document #55729
    Area-IDE
